author: mrglavas
msg: Adding validate-annotations feature to list of DOM paramater names.

author: mrglavas
msg: Fixing a build failure on JDK 1.2. Boolean.valueOf(boolean b) was
being invoked, a method that has only existed since JDK 1.4.

author: ankitp
msg: Initial check in for support of synthetic annotations generation.
Turning this on will cause annotations to be generated for elements containing non-schema
attributes and not containing an annotation element already.
